content: Cutworm infestation in Field #2. Threshold traps show 5 larvae/trap, immediate organic BT spray advised.
metadata: Trap check: 2025-02-02, Control measure: BT-based pesticide

content: Aphids on soybeans in Field #4. Introduced ladybugs at 1000/acre. Monitor weekly for population drop.
metadata: Release date: 2025-02-10, IPM method: beneficial insects

content: Grasshopper sightings near Field #10. Tilling around field edges can disrupt egg-laying sites.
metadata: Farm: Hilltop, sightings: moderate, next inspection: 2025-03-01

content: Rootworm concerns in continuous corn fields. Rotating to soybeans or alfalfa recommended to break lifecycle.
metadata: Fields impacted: #1, #2, Crop rotation needed next season.

content: Weed pressure high in no-till plots. Mechanical weeding tools suggested for early-season weed control.
metadata: Tool: Flex-tine harrow, recommended pass: once at crop emergence.
